name: Veluza
flavorText: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.

previous.name: Cetitan
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

next.name: Dondozo
next.flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

pokemon.name: Veluza
pokemon.flavorText: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.
